articles.author: David Lao
articles.title: ‘Get your flu shot’: Experts warn of impending influenza wave amid COVID-19 - Global News
articles.description: Flu cases had previously dropped to record lows in North America and Europe during the first year of the pandemic.
articles.content: Public health experts are urging Canadians to get their flu shots before, during or even after getting their COVID-19 vaccine jab, warning that the rapidly-approaching flu season could spike back aga… [+4827 chars]
